channel.title: URGENT HELP - Fucked up my Vista/Ubuntu installation
channel.description:
Hey, I partitioned, etc...
GRUB loads, I try and select Vista.. vista loads for a second then goes to a black screen, help?
Last time I tried this happened but I was able to boot up in safe mode and change the boot.ini settings, but now I don't think I can..
:(

item.title: URGENT HELP - Fucked up my Vista/Ubuntu installation
item.dc:creator: @S_ms S!ms
item.description:
@S_ms wrote:

Well, if you partitioned your drives have changed… try manually editing grub by pressing e on the menu, and change like /dev/hda1 to whatever it should be.

Read full topic
item.source: URGENT HELP - Fucked up my Vista/Ubuntu installation

also editing boot.ini wont change anything, the file you wanna edit will be /boot/grub/menu.lst i think

item.description:

item.title: URGENT HELP - Fucked up my Vista/Ubuntu installation
item.dc:creator: @Uriko Uriko
item.description:
@Uriko wrote:

[quote=“Schizzo, post:7, topic:171197”]Do you get an error message if you try to select either the distro or Vista?[/quote]Nope, I can load the distro fine, just when I try to load Vista, the only error message to me is the black screen that appears.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: 06-01-2008, 15:02:18[/size][hr]BUMP, btw when I try loading in safe mode it gets to loading some “crcdisk.sys” or something and then stops… =/i deleted the other (ubuntu) partition using ubuntu live+gparted

Read full topic

item.title: URGENT HELP - Fucked up my Vista/Ubuntu installation
item.dc:creator: @Uriko Uriko
item.description:
@Uriko wrote:

[quote=“Schizzo, post:2, topic:171197”]I’m guessing you have some sort of Linux distro installed along with Vista? Can you access that distro, or is it not working either?[/quote]Yeah, actually up until now GRUB doesn’t load for some reason, I haven’t touched anything.

But it may start up again =/

Uhmm… can I have some info on FixMBR?
